title: Faster, Faster, Faster
description: Volume IV continues what began with the first three installments of Jonah Black's the no-holds-barred, darkly comic tale of one teenager's inner life. Teens will find a new kind of hero in one whose acute observations mirror their own. The journals, in print for all to read, are irresistibly honest and revealing, and sure to satisfy any reader's desire for a real, juicy story. This installment brings us to the final, shocking revelations about Jonah's recent past.
author: Jonah Black
